mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_employee (STREMPLOYEEID, STRLOGINNAME, STRPASSWORD, STRHEADPORTRAIT, STRREALNAME, STRMOBILE, INTSTATUS, STRDUTYID, STRMERCHANTID, STRINSERTTIME) VALUES (#{strEmployeeid}, #{strLoginname}, #{strPassword}, #{strHeadportrait}, #{strRealname}, #{strMobile}, #{intStatus}, #{strDutyid}, #{strMerchantid}, #{strInserttime})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_employee SET STRPASSWORD=#{strPassword} WHERE STREMPLOYEEID=#{strEmployeeid}
mapper.select: SELECT STREMPLOYEEID AS strEmployeeid, STRLOGINNAME AS strLoginname, STRPASSWORD AS strPassword, STRHEADPORTRAIT AS strHeadportrait, STRREALNAME AS strRealname, STRMOBILE AS strMobile, INTSTATUS AS intStatus, STRDUTYID AS strDutyid, STRMERCHANTID AS strMerchantid FROM tb_employee WHERE STRLOGINNAME=#{strLoginname}

SELECT STREMPLOYEEID AS strEmployeeid, STRLOGINNAME AS strLoginname, STRHEADPORTRAIT AS strHeadportrait, STRREALNAME AS strRealname, STRMOBILE AS strMobile, INTSTATUS AS intStatus, STRDUTYID AS strDutyid FROM tb_employee WHERE STREMPLOYEEID=#{strEmployeeid}

SELECT TE.STREMPLOYEEID AS strEmployeeid, TE.STRLOGINNAME AS strLoginname, TE.STRREALNAME AS strRealname, TE.STRMOBILE AS strMobile, TE.INTSTATUS AS intStatus, TD.STRDUTYNAME AS strDutyid, TE.STRINSERTTIME AS strInserttime FROM tb_employee TE, tb_duty TD
TE.STRDUTYID=TD.STRDUTYID
AND (STRREALNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{strSearchkey},'%') OR TD.STRDUTYNAME=#{strSearchkey})
ORDER BY STRINSERTTIME DESC LIMIT #{pageFrom}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(STREMPLOYEEID) FROM tb_employee TE, tb_duty TD
